inferenceModels.name: Default
inferenceModels.description: Our default model, optimized for a wide range of use cases.

inferenceModels.name: TheSpice
inferenceModels.description: A well performing model base on llama3 that generate shorter responses then default. This model was the default from beginning of May to mid June.

inferenceModels.name: Stheno
inferenceModels.description: This model by Sao10k is highly capable at roleplaying, immersing itself in character personas, and generating coherent and engaging text. It has been trained on a diverse dataset and can handle a wide range of topics and scenarios.

inferenceModels.name: Lyra 12B
inferenceModels.description: This recent Mistral Nemo 12B architecture is particularly strong in English, French, German, Spanish, Italian, Portuguese, Chinese, Japanese, Korean, Arabic, and Hindi. (16K context for I'm All In)

inferenceModels.name: Magnum 12B
inferenceModels.description: Strong multilingual model designed to replicate the prose quality of the Claude 3 models, specifically Sonnet and Opus. (16K context for I'm All In)

inferenceModels.name: Spicy 2 (legacy)
inferenceModels.description: Our previous generation model based on Llama1, produce longer responses but get out of character easily (will be retired on September 11th).

inferenceModels.name: Mythomax
inferenceModels.description: It crafts rich narratives, understands global mythologies, and adapts to your choices for an immersive and interactive adventure.

inferenceModels.name: DarkForest V2
inferenceModels.description: Handles complex themes and multiple characters with depth and creativity. Sharp sense of humor, seamlessly switching between SFW and NSFW content

inferenceModels.name: Command-R
inferenceModels.description: Renowned for its creativity, exceptional prompt-following capabilities and capable of interacting in many languages to a fairly high degree of accuracy (will be retired on September 11th).

inferenceModels.name: Mixtral 8x7B
inferenceModels.description: Excels in generating rich SFW narratives and maintaining context in long conversations.

inferenceModels.name: Noromaid 45B
inferenceModels.description: A finetuned version of Mixtral focusing on uncensored roleplaying, one of the best performing models.

inferenceModels.name: Vivian RP
inferenceModels.description: Designed for long, multi-turn human to human dialogue. Best for realistic SFW and NSFW conversations. Updated with more capabilities for longer responses and 8k context window.

inferenceModels.name: Airoboros
inferenceModels.description: Airoboros is a fairly general purpose model, but focuses heavily on instruction following, rather than casual chat/roleplay. Based on popular demand, we've extended the availability of this model.

inferenceModels.name: Midnight Rose 70b
inferenceModels.description: Smart 70B model geared towards nsfw roleplaying and storytelling, wants to go long on it's replies.

inferenceModels.name: WizardLM-2 8x22b
inferenceModels.description: With unmatched knowledge, it creates high-quality narratives that bring characters and worlds to life. Perfect for developing complex storylines and vivid characters, this model is an indispensable asset for any role-playing enthusiast.
